item.title: Why I am going to vote in Thursday’s European Elections (23rd May)
item.author: Hilary Guite,
item.description: Some people might think it is not worth voting in these European elections as the referendum vote means we are going to leave, so why bother? However, a lot of people see this as a proxy for a second referendum and a way of showing support for staying in Europe. Why would people like us, who believe …
